summary: The story of an American journalist, a CIA operative, and an Iraqi photographer against the backdrop of the bloody war in Iraq.
cast: Connie Nielsen|Damian Lewis|Mido Hamada|Driss Roukhe|Nasser Memarzia|Saïd Amadis|Omar Berdouni|Chérine Amar|Shaun Evans|Tom McCarthy|Mahmoudi M'Barek|John Slattery|Peter Eyre|Fatiha Watili|Hamid Basket|Sean Gullette|Jace Newton|Cobi Mohammed|Moutaouakil Mohammed|Salaheddine Debab|Mehdi Amalou|Zenati Badredine|Ragba Amine|Jaouad Boughaba|Zakaria Atifi|Mohammed Taleb|Abdelahk Lazali|Karam Ghazi|Imad Rechiche|Hicham Immounsi|Mohamed Attifi|Dan Murphy|Wendell Steavenson|Youssef Britel|Khadija Kanouni|Zidani Nabil|Latifa Aboudi|Saida Nhili|Nezha Ait Moumen|Mahmoud El Lozy|Jamal Lababsi|Mehdi Jabori|Mehdi Jenani|Nazha Regragui|Khalid M'Rimi|Abedelouhahad Mouaddine|Mehdi Wakass|Mounir Benfares|Naciri Hamid|Bourhaba|Ali Hriouech|Daniel Mulligan|Fadila Boussekssou
title: La situación
